alert.note: Alert for Dougherty; Lee; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 12:22PM EDT until July 22 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Southern Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1222 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Albany, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Albany, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Walker, Sasser, Stocks, Radium Springs, Forrester, Lockett Crossing, South Albany, Southwest Ga Regional A/P, Palmyra, Century, Pecan City, Byne Crossroads, Acree, Armena and Chickasawhatchee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
